name: CompTIA Security+
eng_description: Validates cybersecurity skills including risk management, threat analysis, and incident response.
jap_description: リスク管理、脅威分析、インシデント対応を含むサイバーセキュリティスキルを検証。
jap_subheader: サイバーセキュリティ基礎

name: AWS Certified Data Engineer – Associate
eng_description: Validates ability to design, build, and maintain data analytics solutions on AWS.
jap_description: AWS上でのデータ分析ソリューションの設計・構築・運用スキルを証明。

name: AWS Certified Machine Learning – Specialty
eng_description: Validates expertise in building, training, tuning, and deploying machine learning models on AWS.
jap_description: AWS上での機械学習モデルの構築、トレーニング、チューニング、デプロイの専門知識を証明。
